title: notblox1
author: notblox1
content: Today I tried to open bitcointalk forum few times and it was loading pages very slow, like never before and it was almost unusable.It takes a lot of time to open any page and same thing is happening if I want to send merit to someone or do anything else.All other websites are working fine for me and my internet speed is more than enough to handle everything I need.Is forum under some kind of attack, is this is some scheduled maintenance or something else?

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Yes, you are not that only one experiencing the forum being slow right now.I even have to switch networks as I though I was having a internet problem or something as my wife verified that internet right now is very slow on our end.But when I did received a Cloudfare error, I said that the issue was with the forum itself. Maybe we will have to wait a few more minutes to see what's going on from behind.

comments.author: imamusma
comments.body: The same thing had been happening a lot lately, but it should be back to normal in a few moments. There have been several threads discussing the same issue on the meta so far, maybe you'll want to take a look too and find some helpful answers.Here's theymos response some time ago about the same issue:Quote from: theymos on May 19, 2023, 05:31:47 PMMy best guess at this point is that it was a random failure of some networking hardware. It doesn't look like any failure I've seen before, so it's difficult to diagnose. It doesn't particularly look like a DDoS or other attack, though I can't rule it out.There won't be any downtime if/when I change anything regarding images.

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: I also observed the same thing. At first I thought probably I had run out of data or something but discovered I still had enough. Then I tried checking in only to discover the issue is from the bitcointalk browser. The rate at which this is occurring is becoming disturbing and this should be like the fourth if not fifth time such a challenge is being encountered.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I believe it's from your end as I have never experienced it today, although I am not regular online since morning maybe we can say there's a system update going on. Well lets see if any other person experienced this as well.

comments.author: nurilham
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on July 08, 2023, 09:54:41 PMI believe it's from your end as I have never experienced it today, although I am not regular online since morning maybe we can say there's a system update going on.I also experienced this, but it seems just happen recently. So, it didn't happen a whole day. However, it is likely over already, there is no longer a problem in accessing forum. I think it is not about the maintenance or system update, the problem is on the host. Not sure what happened, but it is a common issue by the way.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on July 08, 2023, 09:54:41 PMI believe it's from your end as I have never experienced it today, although I am not regular online since morning maybe we can say there's a system update going on.Well lets see if any other person experienced this as well.I'm also experiencing the same thing - but only 1 of the 5 tab I have open. But now it seems pretty normal - I mean no problem anymore even if I have 5 to 10 tab open at the same time.System updates don't seem to bother the forum - this has happened many times. Theymos doesn't rule out attacks like DDOS or other attacks as imamusma quotes.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Seems to be ok now, I guess Theymos is doing something in the background. I don't think that we are being DDoS though, in my opinion. The least of my speculation is that maybe there are programs harvesting some data in this forum to make it slow.Either way we are back to normal now and hopefully there will be no more slowing down.

The least of my speculation is that maybe there are programs harvesting some data in this forum to make it slow.It is working better now but I had a lot of trouble in last few hours and I it was very hard for me to create this topic, and it failed two or three times.To prevent other members posting spam and low value posts I am locking this topic now, but I will unlock it if I notice same problems tomorrow.

comments.author: Baofeng

But when you check your profile, your comment has been posted already. As you can notice in this board already, someone has multiple posts. Perhaps he thought that his original post didn't went through so he just click the "Post" button again.So I will suggest to check your profile after posting to see if it went it or not to avoid double posting.

comments.body: This issues was much today I wasn't the close to my system yesterday and today due to this problem I was actually think this forum has been hacked by some unscrupulous users. But lately this evening it became more better than before despite isn't allowing me to submit my post free but is more preferable than previous state.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: When you created the thread, forum was working on my side, AFAIK, because, before getting notification of your thread on my TG, i just made some replies. So, i think at the creation of your posts, things just getting started. As i slept after seeing the notification and planned to answer it later. But later i was also facing the same issue and you were able to make some post but mine was not opening. So, i just gave up, and waiting for the website to recover into normal function. Still i think telegram bot is facing some difficulties to scrap data. But an hour ago i did received some notification which indicated that things are normal now. Thats what i hoped though.
